body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information. As part of the conversation, the customer should ask two questions.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should cover two or three topics, have back and forth between the parties, and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello, thank you for contacting Richardson Construction. My name is Jerry Richardson. May I have your name, please?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Hello Jerry, my name is Kelly Barnes.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Great to meet you, Kelly. Could you please provide me with your email address and phone number for our records?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, my email address is kelly.b@domain.com and my phone number is five five five - two three four - one zero one zero.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you, Kelly, for sharing that information with us. How can I assist you today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: I have a question about our data management system. Are there any updates planned for it?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Certainly, we are currently working on upgrading our data management system to enhance performance and security. Do you have any other questions for me, Kelly?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Yes, I'm interested to know how long the upgrade process will take.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: The upgrade process typically takes about two weeks to ensure a smooth transition. Thank you for your patience, Kelly.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for reaching out to us, Kelly. If you have any more questions or need further assistance, feel free to contact us again.

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Thank you, Jerry. I appreciate your help. Have a great day!

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: You're welcome, Kelly. Have a wonderful day as well!
